title: Show Notes with Shannon-Patty in Slow Motion and Stories from Washington State
itunes:title: Show Notes with Shannon-Patty in Slow Motion and Stories from Washington State
description: On this edition, Dave Hallet is sharing one of his interviews done with Chris, from Washington State. Chris was present for a lecture by the late Dr. Grover Krantz, who gave his insight into the Patterson-Gimlin film. He will also tell of a couple of experiences he had in Washington State.
